Title: Knowledge of Giants I
Text:
Barachen is at his camp south of the Great East Road that runs through the South Trollshaws. Scouts along the road can direct you to him.

Elladan told you that Barachen reported seeing one of the Giants somewhere in the wild and wants you to talk to him about it.
CompleteText: I have long believed that the Giants of legend have walked among the wooded areas of the Trollshaws, but I have never seen one for myself until now.
